title: Additional Resources
disclaimer: Inclusion on this list does not imply that the Wyoming Youth Resource Map is affiliated with or endorses these organizations and/or resources.

resources.name: 211 â€” Wyoming
resources.description: Dial 2-1-1 or visit 211.org to find local resources for food, housing, health care, employment, and more.

resources.name: The Youth Alliance Help Hotlines
resources.description:
A youth-oriented list of national hotlines that provide anonymous, confidential information to callers. 
 These hotlines can answer questions, offer support, and make referrals to other helpful organizations in times of need. If you are in danger and require immediate help, call 911.

resources.name: National Crisis Resources (Crisis Text Line)
resources.description: List of resources curated & vetted by a national crisis text line service. Resources are all free or low-cost, and available for viewing on mobile phones.

resources.name: Wyoming 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline
resources.description: Call or text 988 for free, confidential support 24/7 for anyone in suicidal crisis or emotional distress.
